sancharaka bangladesha kandayamata erehiwa shri lankawa muhunadena diwarathri dewani ekdina tharagaya ada (25) hambanthota mahinda rajapaksha anthar jathika kridanganayedi pawathwe.depila athara pereda pawathi palamu ekdina tharagayen kadulu 8ka jayak labu shri lankawa tharaga 3kin samanwitha tharagawaliye jaya wartha kirime aramunin ada tharagayata piwiseyi. pereda pawathi palamu tharagaye di kasiye wasiya dinagath shri lankawa palamuwa panduwata paharadimata bangladeshayata arayum kala athara bangladeshaya oowara 50 awasanaye di kadulu 8k dawi lakunu 259k wartha kaleya.aarambhaka pithikaru thamim ikbal siya ekdina tharaga diwiye siwuwani shathakaya raskala athara ohuta anagi sahayak labadun nasir hosen nodawi lakunu 73k labagaththeya.
